title: Rate Interpretation Dashboard
description: Interactive dashboard for interpreting derivative values in context by connecting numerical rates to physical meaning. Features four real-world scenarios: population growth, cooling coffee, drug concentration, and stock prices, each with appropriate units and verbal interpretations.
creator: Dan McCreary
subject: Calculus
Derivatives
Rate of Change
Applications
Interpretation
prerequisites: Understanding of derivatives as rates of change
learningObjective: Students will interpret derivative values in context by connecting numerical rates to physical meaning
